questions.description: You may submit this information for the three most recent tax years, pay stubs from the most recent six months, and/or a letter from your employer if you believe any of these items will help you qualify
questions.tool_tip: A copy of your individual Federal income tax return, including W-2s for the most recent tax year, or a statement and/or evidence describing why you were not required to file. Also include a copy of each and every Form 1099, Schedule, and any other evidence of reported income. You may submit this information for the three most recent tax years, pay stubs from the most recent six months, and/or a letter from your employer if you believe any of these items will help you qualify.

questions.description: Coast Guard and are sponsoring your spouse or child using the 100 percent of the Federal Poverty Guidelines, provide proof of your active military status
questions.tool_tip: If you are on active duty in the U.S. Armed Forces or U.S. Coast Guard and are sponsoring your spouse or child using the 100 percent of the Federal Poverty Guidelines, provide proof of your active military status.

questions.description: If your legal guardian is signing this Form I-864EZ for you, the legal guardian must present:
questions.tool_tip: If your legal guardian is signing this Form I-864EZ for you, the legal guardian must present:

questions.description: Proof of the appointment as legal guardian of your estate; and
questions.tool_tip: Proof of the appointment as legal guardian of your estate; and

questions.description: A copy of an order from the appointing court or agency specifically permitting the legal guardian to make your income and assets available for the support of the sponsored immigrant
questions.tool_tip: A copy of an order from the appointing court or agency specifically permitting the legal guardian to make your income and assets available for the support of the sponsored immigrant.
